fullText:
Whenever a cell of a central battery emergency luminaire and exit sign system is replaced for any reason, the replacement shall be made in accordance with the following:
(a)	Replacement batteries shall be of the same or compatible type and ampere-hour capacity.
(b)	At the next routine service interval, a discharge test shall be conducted in accordance with Table A2. The duration shall be the in-service duration stated in Clause 2.2.
NOTES:
1	See Appendix B for information to facilitate the maintenance of batteries and battery chargers.
2	End-of-life batteries should be collected and recycled.
